theme_mods.banner_section_title: Stuggling In Life? I Can Help.
theme_mods.banner_section_description: life coach makes easier. After all, the problem isn't about you at all. The idea that someone (and preferably a therapist) should tell people how to overcome their challenges is silly on several levels.
theme_mods.bc_content_for_cta_block_1: 30 minutes free for the first session. T&C Apply
theme_mods.bc_content_for_cta_block_2: I can help by coaching in life. life coaching makes the most of your time away from home, and if you find yourself looking for a new way to stay connected with these people that are already close-knit. Here are some tips on finding them
theme_mods.bc_heading_for_about: Why Most People Get Excited About Coaching
theme_mods.bc_content_for_about: A life coach can help a person to identify strengths, develop them, and identify personal and professional goals. Their role is to assist the coachee throughout the change process. As you will discover, this happens in several ways. It's supposed to help them find happiness. It has an addictive nature, that really comes through in the message and they believe there is something good happening when we talk.
theme_mods.bc_short_desc_for_about: life coach makes people feel less vulnerable and helps them improve their attitudes toward risktaking.
theme_mods.bc_heading_for_counter: Get 15-Minutes Complimentary Zoom or Skype session.
theme_mods.bc_content_for_offer: Get 15-Minutes Complimentary Zoom or Skype session.
theme_mods.bc_heading_for_benefit: Benefits of Life Coach By An Expert
theme_mods.bc_content_for_benefit:
Easier for those new people and their families to find each other. It's supposed to help them find happiness.
Encourage others without passing judgment. Help individuals perform at their highest levels.
